objects.text: • BOLD CRUNCH • SWEET & SPICY • FAMILY SIZE PACK

product_details.description: If your tongue is torn between choosing spicy or sweet, give it a delicious tango of Doritos spicy sweet chili flavored tortilla chips. Each bite is a mouth-watering, tooth-rattling crunch of delicious sweet and spicy flavor. Combine the Doritos crunch with a combination of spicy and sweet, and you’ve got an unstoppably delicious snack. Grab a bag and stock up on the bold taste of Doritos spicy sweet chili tortilla chips. Pack of 4, total 42 ounce Tortilla chips flavored with spicy sweet chili Packaged in a convenient take-home bag Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Sweet Chilli ** Unit Count - 168.32 Ounce ** Number of Items - 4 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and vibrant design centered around a snack product. The background uses a deep purple radial gradient with subtle geometric overlays and decorative elements. At the center, the **product_image** is prominently displayed, framed by a glowing circular stroke that draws attention. The **heading** text in bold white, all-caps font introduces the product name, while the **subheading** below it highlights the flavor in a warm golden-yellow color.

To the right of the product image, the **price** is enclosed in an eye-catching orange circle with yellow stroke, creating a strong contrast. Along the bottom, the **tagline** provides concise feature highlights in white bullet-pointed text. A strong **cta_background** block in vibrant orange supports the **cta** text inviting action in bold white font.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple (#4A1A68)
- Bright Orange (#FF4500)
- Golden Yellow (#FFAA00)
- White (#FFFFFF)

This layout emphasizes visual hierarchy and product impact through contrast, alignment, and bright colors.
product_color: The Doritos Spicy Sweet Chili packaging uses a bold and striking color palette to evoke intensity and flavor. Dominated by a rich, vibrant purple background (#4B0082), it creates a dramatic contrast with the fiery orange-yellow flames (#FFA500, #FF4500) engulfing the bright golden tortilla chips (#FDBA4D). The sharp, black triangle outline (#000000) adds depth and intensity, while the white font (#FFFFFF) ensures brand visibility. The blending of flames and chip colors with the dark backdrop creates a sense of motion and heat while subtly highlighting the tangy spiciness. These colors work together to promise bold, flavorful excitement in a snack.
